bike.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, smooth welds, hydroformed top tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube, BB91 bottom bracket. Rear triangle: A2-SL custom-butted alloy monostay w/ cold-forged dropout, post disc mount and replaceable hanger
